input_text:
Job Title: Engineering Associate – Exciting Opportunity for Growth

Location: Austin, TX

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Engineering, Information Technology

Description:
We are looking for a dedicated and skilled Engineering Associate to join our dynamic team at a well-established civil engineering firm in Austin, TX. As our client, you will have the opportunity to work on very high profile projects as a secondary focus, along with leading smaller projects, providing a unique blend of project experience. Our rapid growth at this moment means you will have the chance to get in on the ground floor and make a significant impact on our future success. Join our innovative and dynamic team and be part of something special.

Benefits

– Hybrid work schedule with 2 days onsite and 3 days remote, offering flexibility and work-life balance.

– Opportunity to work on innovative projects in Austin, San Antonio, Houston, and Dallas, contributing to the infrastructure and communities of Central Texas.

– Competitive salary, comprehensive benefits package, and ample opportunities for career advancement, employee growth, and training.

Responsibilities

– Collaborate with licensed engineers to plan, analyze, and design projects for municipalities across Central Texas, focusing on stormwater and watershed management projects.

– Utilize technical expertise in hydrologic and hydraulic/2D computer modeling to contribute to the success of various civil engineering projects.

– Develop design calculations, cost estimates, and construction drawings with attention to detail and adherence to project timelines, ensuring project success.

Requirements

– Bachelor’s Degree in Civil Engineering with a minimum GPA of 3.0.

– Minimum 3 years of relevant experience in civil engineering.

– FE/EIT Certification required, showcasing your commitment to professional development and growth.

Do you have any disability or condition that could affect you in the application and interview process? Please feel free to share this information as part of your application, including any necessary adjustments you might need, so we can help make the process easier for you. We assure you this information will not have any negative effect on the interview process outcome.

About NonStop: We are NonStop, a leading provider of staffing solutions throughout Europe and now also in the US. We’re passionate about connecting talent with opportunity and work non-stop to support our clients in hiring the best talent for their teams. Feel free to pop over to our website, NonStop Consulting (https://www.nonstopconsulting.com), for more information, to browse all our roles, or to let us know how we can help you.

Experience Level (if available): Entry level
